duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on real-life projects in the field of data science and AI, using GCP or Azure Cloud.
Collaborate with the team to analyze data, experiment, and create statistical models.
Gain hands-on experience in machine learning, NLP, and AI technologies.
Develop and practice the skills required for a successful career in data science and AI.
Work on multiple projects independently and as part of a team, meeting quality and deadline standards.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related technical fields.
